sentences.english: In the internationalcapital market, the share of Chinese mining is very rare.

sentences.english: Mining and oil stocks moved lower, especially in London.

sentences.english: To be sure, the mines are much safer than just six years ago.

sentences.english: Mining stocks, which are especially sensitive to economic growth prospects led the gains.

sentences.english: Based on the results of analysis, solutions to the marketization of China's mineral properties are proposed.

sentences.english: Sustainable development of mining industry is a perdurable demand of human.

sentences.english: Chinese-owned enterprises have pumped money into Zambia's mining sector in recent years.

sentences.english: Although China currently monopolizes rare earth mining, other countries have deposits too.

sentences.english: Therefore, the comprehensive utilization of these tailings is an important task.
